Sequence Information.Peptide Name: CRR (Cy-s-rich region, Synthetic AMPs, C-terminal fragment of SpCrus2, 6S=S, UCSS1a)
Sequence Information.Source: Sequence truncation, Crustaceans, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (56.46%) toSpCrus2C: 14% (12 Cys); P: 12%.Activity: Active against Gram+ S. aureus (MIC 2.8-5.6 uM), B. subtilis (MIC 2.8-5.6 uM), and B. megaterium (MIC 2.8-5.6 uM).Recombinant production:bacteria:Escherichia coli: expressed and prufied.
Literature Information.Author: Wang H, Zhang JX, Wang Y, Fang WH, Wang Y, Zhou JF, Zhao S, Li XC. 2018
Literature Information.Title: Newly identified type II crustin (SpCrus2) in Scylla paramamosain contains a distinct cysteine distribution pattern exhibiting broad antimicrobial activity.
